T02D2518:62a-1: badzra satva s'a dha no pa yi ka /
T02D2518:62a-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2518:62a-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal la //
T02D2518:62a-5: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2518:62a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' 'gro ba'i mgon //
T02D2518:62a-7: yang dang yang du phyag byas nas //
T02D2518:62a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' stsol mdzad pa'i //
T02D2518:62a-9: sgrub pa'i thabs ni bshad par bya //
T02D2518:62a-10: de la rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D2518:62a-11: der bsrung ba'i dam tshig yongs su bsrungs la /
T02D2518:62a-12: sems dag pa dang ldan pas khrus byas kyang rung /
T02D2518:62a-14: yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su yod na dri la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor byas shing /
T02D2518:62b-1: ras ris la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sku bzhugs te /
T02D2518:62b-2: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a ka
T02D2518:62b-3: tsitta pra na me na badzra banda n'am ka ro
T02D2518:62b-4: mi / zhes brjod cing yan lag lngas phyag bya'o //
T02D2518:62b-5: de nas phyag bzhi byas la /
T02D2518:62b-6: bus mo gnyis sa la btsugs te /
T02D2518:62b-7: snying gar rdo rje thal mo yang dag par sbyar nas /
T02D2518:62b-8: dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang //
T02D2518:62b-9: bgyid stsal rjes su yi rang gang yin pa //
T02D2518:62b-10: de dag thams cad byang chub mchog can gyi //
T02D2518:62b-11: spyan sngar ma lus da ltar so sor bshags //
T02D2518:62b-12: bde bar gshegs pa'i sras kyi tshogs gnyis po //
T02D2518:62b-13: zab pa dang ni rgya chen 'gro kun gyi //
T02D2518:62b-14: don ni sgrub par byed pa de dag la //
T02D2518:62b-15: gzhan pa la yang bdag ni rjes yi rang //
T02D2518:62b-16: thugs rjes thugs ldan blo gros sdig bral ba'i //
T02D2518:62b-17: gti mug bcom pa'i sku ni phun sum tshogs //
T02D2518:62b-18: ma lus rigs kyi padma'i nang bzhugs pa //
T02D2518:62b-19: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2518:62b-20: blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba dang //
T02D2518:62b-21: dman pa 'jigs byed nyid kyi rgyal byed tshal //
T02D2518:62b-22: srid pa'i 'byor pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog / gsung mchog chos la'ang bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02D2518:62b-23: srid pa'i 'ching ba dag dang rnam bral ba //
T02D2518:62b-24: 'dod chags la sogs sprul gyi dug bcom zhing //
T02D2518:62b-25: blo gros rnam rgyal thugs rjer ldan pa yi //
T02D2518:62b-26: brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2518:62b-27: rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i yul bdag nyid //
T02D2518:62b-28: 'bras bu'i stobs kyis dgra las rgyal gyur ba'i //
T02D2518:62b-29: so sor rtogs nas snying rje'i rtsa ba can //
T02D2518:62b-30: mnyam med sems ni byang chub sems bskyed bgyi //
T02D2518:62b-31: sems can rnams ni yongs su smin pa'am //
T02D2518:62b-32: yang na yongs su bskyab par bya phyir ram //
T02D2518:62b-33: rang gi sems ni dag par bya phyir ram //
T02D2518:62b-34: 'di kun thams cad rtsva sogs bzhin du gtang //
T02D2518:62b-35: de bzhin tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dang //
T02D2518:62b-36: bsam gtan shes rab la na med pa 'di //
T02D2518:62b-37: bdag dang gzhan rnams dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2518:62b-38: skad cig re rer zhing yang bsgom par bgyi //
T02D2518:63a-0: @63a * // bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags la mkhas pa yis //
T02D2518:63a-1: chos rgyal rtags tu lhun gyis grub pa ni //
T02D2518:63a-2: 'gro ba'i tshogs kyis thob par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2518:63a-3: 'dir ni bdag gis mkha' 'drar gnas par bgyi //
T02D2518:63a-5: de nas nga rgyal gyis 'dug ste ;
T02D2518:63a-7: sarba bi shuddha: sarbba dharmma: svabh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D2518:63a-8: zhes bya ba dor la mos shing brjod do //
T02D2518:63a-9: de'i 'og tu sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir /
T02D2518:63a-10: badzra satva bha ba yang zhes bya ba mngon du byas nas /
T02D2518:63a-11: gzugs brnyan gyi sbyor bas phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o ;
T02D2518:63a-12: / de la thal mo dam du bsdams pa las /
T02D2518:63a-13: sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni //
T02D2518:63a-14: rdo rje thal mo bka' stsal pa //
T02D2518:63a-15: rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams //
T02D2518:63a-16: badzra aanydza li zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo'i sngags so //
T02D2518:63a-17: badzra bandha zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa yin te /
T02D2518:63a-18: badzra bandha trat ces lan gsum brjod cing /
T02D2518:63a-19: rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dral bar bya'o //
T02D2518:63a-20: aom badzra a'a be sha zhes bya bas rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2518:63a-21: yi ge aa: sa bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2518:63a-22: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni /
T02D2518:63a-23: rdo rje bcings pa mdzub gnyis bsdams //
T02D2518:63a-26: tishtha badzra dri dho me bha wa sh'a shva to me bha ba /
T02D2518:63a-27: hri da yam me aa dhi tishtha sarba siddhi mme
T02D2518:63a-28: pra yatstsha h'um ha ha ha ha ho: zhes bya
T02D2518:63a-30: snying gar zla ba dang rdo rje brtan par byas nas /
T02D2518:63a-31: badzra mushti zhes pas dam tshig rdo rje khu tshur bcings la /
T02D2518:63a-32: aom badzra mushti bam zhes bya bas phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid dang ldan par bsam mo //
T02D2518:63a-33: des na dam tshig gi phyag rgya min pa gsum po la /
T02D2518:63a-34: su ra ta stvam zhes brjod do //
T02D2518:63a-35: rdo rje de la badzra satva zhes bya ba bkod la /
T02D2518:63a-36: de nyid yid kyis brjod de /
T02D2518:63a-37: bdag ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o zhes bsam par bya'o //
T02D2518:63a-38: de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa de'i steng du /
T02D2518:63a-39: de nyid las yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa
T02D2518:63a-40: de badzra satva zhes bya ba dang bcas pa las
T02D2518:63a-41: rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i 'od zer gyis khyab pa'i
T02D2518:63b-0: snying po dang bcas pa @63b la ;
T02D2518:63b-1: de'i steng du nga rgyal du bsgom par bya zhing /
T02D2518:63b-2: rdo rje de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phra rab bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2518:63b-4: kun bdag sems dpa' bdag nyid grags //
T02D2518:63b-5: bdag nyid kyang ni bdag la gnas //
T02D2518:63b-6: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs nas ;
T02D2518:63b-7: rdo rje de badzra satva aa ham zhes brjod cing /
T02D2518:63b-8: rdo rje sems dpar nges par bskyed la /
T02D2518:63b-9: sgeg pa dang bcas pas rdo rje bsor te /
T02D2518:63b-10: badzra satva h'um zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2518:63b-11: de nas ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2518:63b-12: yang rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas sa ma yo ham zhes brjod do //
T02D2518:63b-13: de nas de nyid dang sa ma ya satva aa
T02D2518:63b-14: dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes bya bas snying ga dang
T02D2518:63b-17: spyi bo dag tu byin gyis brlab po //
T02D2518:63b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2518:63b-19: badzra satva aom badzra satva h'um zhes brjod la /
T02D2518:63b-20: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
T02D2518:63b-21: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid grags //
T02D2518:63b-22: de nas phyag rgya bcings byas nas sa ma ya aa: zhes brjod de /
T02D2518:63b-23: mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sprul la /
T02D2518:63b-24: de'i steng du badzra satva aa: zhes bya ba 'dis rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab par bya'o //
T02D2518:63b-25: de nas badzro ham zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal bskyed la /
T02D2518:63b-26: de nyid badzra satva ham zhes brjod de /
T02D2518:63b-27: rdo rje sems dpar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2518:63b-28: de nyid du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i snying po /
T02D2518:63b-29: badzra aam ku sha dza: badzra p'a sha h'um /
T02D2518:63b-31: badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas dgug pa dang /
T02D2518:63b-35: de nas de dag gi phyag rgya rdo rje khu tshur las byung ba /
T02D2518:63b-36: mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba ni //
T02D2518:63b-37: mthe'u chung las te lcags kyu che //
T02D2518:63b-38: de ni rdo rje lcags kyu'o //
T02D2518:63b-39: mkhrig ma mdud pa zhags pa'o //
T02D2518:63b-40: mdzub gnyis mdud pa lcags sgrog go //
T02D2518:63b-41: rgyab gnyis kyang ni mnyam ste mnan //
T02D2518:63b-43: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la badzra
T02D2518:63b-44: satva dri shya zhes bya ba brjod de bltas la
T02D2518:63b-45: / ye shes sems dpa' de mthong nas //
T02D2518:64a-0: @64a * // rang gi lus la rnam shes bsgoms //
T02D2518:64a-1: rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02D2518:64a-2: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba 'dis dgug cing gzhug la bcing ba dang /
T02D2518:64a-3: dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya /
T02D2518:64a-4: de nyid dang sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod pas /
T02D2518:64a-5: rgyab tu zla ba grub nas ni //
T02D2518:64a-6: sa ma ya stvam aa ham brjod /
T02D2518:64a-7: der bdag sems dpa'i lus su bsgom //
T02D2518:64a-8: badzra satva aom badzra satva h'um /
T02D2518:64a-10: bzhad pa dang bcas sku mdog dkar //
T02D2518:64a-11: zla ba'i gdan dan zla ba'i 'od //
T02D2518:64a-12: sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can /
T02D2518:64a-13: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
T02D2518:64a-14: rab tu dgyes pas spyan gdangs pa //
T02D2518:64a-15: mgon po rdo rje dril bu bsnams //
T02D2518:64a-16: phyag rgya chen po rnam par bzhugs //
T02D2518:64a-17: badzra drishti ma ta zhes bya ba mig la bkod de /
T02D2518:64a-18: yang sems ma rdo rje la sogs pas /
T02D2518:64a-22: spyi por byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D2518:64a-23: satva badzra aa dhi tishtha m'am zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2518:64a-24: sems ma rdo rje mas snying gar /
T02D2518:64a-25: ratna badzri aa dhi tishtha m'am zhes pa dang /
T02D2518:64a-26: rin chen rdo rje mas dpral bar /
T02D2518:64a-27: dharma badzri aa dhi tishtha m'am zhes bya ba dang chos kyi rdo rje mas lkog ma dang /
T02D2518:64a-28: karma badzri aa dhi tishtha m'am zhes bya ba dang ;
T02D2518:64a-29: las kyi rdo rje mas spyi bor ro //
T02D2518:64a-30: sems ma rdo rje ma ni rdo rje bsdams pa
T02D2518:64a-31: las gung mo myu gu ltar snyoms te bsgreng ba'o
T02D2518:64a-32: // rin chen rdo rje ma'i de nyid las gung mo rin po che lta bur bkug pa'o //
T02D2518:64a-33: chos kyi rdo rje ma'i de nyid pas gung mo dang srin lag padma lta bur bkug pa'o //
T02D2518:64a-34: las kyi rdo rje ma ni de nyid las mdzub mo dgug pa'o //
T02D2518:64a-35: de dag gis rang gi snying ga dang /
T02D2518:64a-38: spyi bo dag tu rdo rje dang /
T02D2518:64a-41: sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2518:64a-42: yi ge h'um las snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bskyed la /
T02D2518:64a-43: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod de dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad la rab tu sbyor zhing /
T02D2518:64a-44: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2518:64a-45: bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2518:64a-46: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod do //
T02D2518:64a-47: yid kyi legs pa'i sbyor bas rang gi lus la sangs rgyas thams cad bcug la /
T02D2518:64b-0: aom @64b badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02D2518:64b-3: tishtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02D2518:64b-4: su to shdyo me bha ba /
T02D2518:64b-5: aa nu ra kto me bha ba /
T02D2518:64b-6: su po shdyo me bha ba /
T02D2518:64b-9: tsittam she ya: ku ru h'um /
T02D2518:64b-10: ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga b'a na sarbba
T02D2518:64b-11: ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa badzra'i bha
T02D2518:64b-12: ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa: zhes bya
T02D2518:64b-13: ba'i yi ge brgya pa 'dis brtan par byas nas
T02D2518:64b-14: / bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2518:64b-15: rdo rje thal mo bcings pa las /
T02D2518:64b-16: mthe bo gnyis ni bsnol byas la //
T02D2518:64b-17: mdzub mo rtse mo bkug nas ni /
T02D2518:64b-18: gung mo snyoms pa'i tshigs su sbyar //
T02D2518:64b-19: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad//
T02D2518:64b-21: aom badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri h'um badzri ni aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes brjod pas /
T02D2518:64b-22: spyi gtsug tu rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po nyi ma'i 'od can /
T02D2518:64b-23: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2518:64b-25: gung mo gnyis ni rdo rjer byas //
T02D2518:64b-27: aom badzra badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes bya bas /
T02D2518:64b-28: dpral ba'i steng du mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon
T02D2518:64b-29: po nyi ma'i 'od can sa gnon gyi phyag rgyas
T02D2518:64b-32: gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya //
T02D2518:64b-33: zhes bya ba 'di dang aom ratna badzri ni h'um
T02D2518:64b-34: aabhi shnytsa m'am zhes bya bas rna ba g-yas pa'i
T02D2518:64b-35: steng du rin chen 'byung ldan gser btso ma'i mdog
T02D2518:64b-36: can nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa /
T02D2518:64b-37: mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2518:64b-38: de nyid las gung mo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung padma ltar byas pa'i 'di dang /
T02D2518:64b-39: aom dharmma badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes bya bas /
T02D2518:64b-40: mgo bo'i rgyab tu 'od dpag tu med pa sku
T02D2518:64b-41: mdog dmar po nyi ma'i 'od can ting nge 'dzin
T02D2518:64b-42: gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2518:64b-43: de nyid las lag pa'i sor mo brkyang pa 'di dang /
T02D2518:64b-44: aom karma badzri ni h'um aa bhi shnytsi m'am zhes bya ba 'dis rna ba g-yon pa'i steng du /
T02D2518:64b-45: don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang gu nyi ma'i
T02D2518:64b-46: 'od can mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsam
T02D2518:64b-47: par bya'o // de nyid las zhes bya ba ni
T02D2518:64b-48: thams cad rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag
T02D2518:64b-49: par bya'o // rgya yin no // aom tum zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2518:65a-1: khu tshur gnyis kyis bskor zhing snying gar mdud pa bcing ba'i tshul du byas la /
T02D2518:65a-2: de bzhin du mgrin pa dang /
T02D2518:65a-9: dpral bar go cha bgo bar bya'o //
T02D2518:65a-10: de nas phreng ba bcing ba dang /
T02D2518:65a-11: dar dbyangs pa'i tshul du byas nas /
T02D2518:65a-12: sor mo thams cad tha ma la sogs pa nas bkrol te /
T02D2518:65a-13: mthar mnyam pa'i thal mo dang /
T02D2518:65a-14: badzra tu shyo ho: zhes bya ba 'dis dgyes par bya'o //
T02D2518:65a-15: lce la yi ge h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D2518:65a-16: sa ma ya stvam zhes bya ba'i chos kyi yi ge bsam par bya'o //
T02D2518:65a-17: snying gar yi ge aa: las sna tshogs rdor je bskyed la /
T02D2518:65a-18: las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02D2518:65a-19: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas /
T02D2518:65a-20: bsgyings bcas gnyi ga bsor ba'o //
T02D2518:65a-21: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2518:65a-22: aom rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas na //
T02D2518:65a-23: rdo rje rin chen bla na med //
T02D2518:65a-24: rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas //
T02D2518:65a-25: rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur //
T02D2518:65a-26: zhes brjod cing re re zhing rdo rje'i gar byas la /
T02D2518:65a-27: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa brgyad kyis bdag nyid la mchod par bya'o //
T02D2518:65a-28: de nas bsgyings pa dang bcas pas rdo rje bsor zhing /
T02D2518:65a-29: rang gi snying gar rdo rje bstod pa'i tshul gyis gzung ste /
T02D2518:65a-30: rang gi snying po dan sngags brjod pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D2518:65a-31: de ltar bdag nyid bskyed nas yid kyis bar snang la 'dug ste /
T02D2518:65a-32: khams gsum ma lus pa nam mkha' lta bur bsam par bya'o //
T02D2518:65a-33: de nas nam mkha'i phyogs der yi ge yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2518:65a-34: de'i steng du bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2518:65a-35: de'i steng du lam las gser gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2518:65a-36: yang de'i steng du yi ge bam las rgya mtsho chen po dang /
T02D2518:65a-37: de nas h'um sum h'um zhes bya ba las ri rab zur bzhi pa /
T02D2518:65a-38: rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa /
T02D2518:65a-39: gser gyi ri bo la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba bskyed la /
T02D2518:65a-40: rdo rje bsdams pa kha sbub pa sa la reg pa dang /
T02D2518:65b-0: @65b aom badzra dram dho me bha ba raksha sarb'am sv'a h'a /
T02D2518:65b-1: zhes bya ba 'dis rdo rje dang 'dra bar byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2518:65b-2: yi ge h'um las rtse mo rdo rje dang rin po ches spras pa'i gzhal yas khang bskyed la /
T02D2518:65b-3: de'i dbus su aom sim aa: zhes bya ba las
T02D2518:65b-4: seng ge'i gdan la aa las byung ba'i zla ba'i
T02D2518:65b-5: dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa bskyed cing /
T02D2518:65b-6: nam mkha'i phyogs nas babs te /
T02D2518:65b-7: de nyid du 'dug la mdun du gdan gnyis pa de bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02D2518:65b-8: gdan de la badzra satva zhes bya ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das sprul la /
T02D2518:65b-9: aom badzra sa m'a ya dza: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod do //
T02D2518:65b-10: bsdu ba'i phyag rgyas spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D2518:65b-11: lag ngar rdo rje bcings nas ni //
T02D2518:65b-12: rdo rje se gol brdab byas nas //
T02D2518:65b-13: sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag bsdu //
T02D2518:65b-15: g-yon pa'i se gol brdabs pa dang //
T02D2518:65b-17: g-yas pa thal mo zhes bya ste ;
T02D2518:65b-18: /'dus pa yang ni gnyis ka yin //
T02D2518:65b-19: zhes bya ba 'di bsdu ba'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2518:65b-20: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02D2518:65b-21: phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //
T02D2518:65b-22: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
T02D2518:65b-23: lan cig rab tu brjod par bgyi //
T02D2518:65b-24: su zhig ming rnams 'chang ba ni //
T02D2518:65b-25: zhi ba'i rgyal po rtsa brgyad 'dis //
T02D2518:65b-26: rdo rje ming dbang bskur la sogs //
T02D2518:65b-27: mchog rnams kun gyis de dbang bskur //
T02D2518:65b-28: gang zhig yon tan ming rnams kyi //
T02D2518:65b-29: rdo rje 'chang ba chen po la //
T02D2518:65b-30: rtag tu dbyangs kyis bstod pa ni //
T02D2518:65b-32: de nas sprul pa de la /
T02D2518:65b-33: bcom ldan 'das kyi rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2518:65b-34: badzra satva dri shyas blta bar byas la /
T02D2518:65b-35: dza: h'um bam nyo: zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2518:65b-36: sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas /
T02D2518:65b-40: dbang du byas te bsgrubs nas /
T02D2518:65b-42: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02D2518:65b-45: zhes bya ba yang brjod par bya'o //
T02D2518:65b-46: de la zla ba lta bu'i lag gnyis kyis //
T02D2518:65b-47: gung mo btang bar gyur pa dang //
T02D2518:65b-48: mthe bong mthe'u chung mdzub mo bsgreng //
T02D2518:65b-49: sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgreng rdo rje //
T02D2518:66a-1: dang las dang phyag rgya chen pos bcom ldan 'das la rgyas btab la dbang bskur te /
T02D2518:66a-2: tshogs pa yod na bzla bar bya ba brjod cing /
T02D2518:66a-3: mchod pa'i yo byad lnga po dag gis yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2518:66a-4: gar las byung ba'i sgeg mo la sos pa'i las kyi phyag rgya brgyad dang /
T02D2518:66a-13: zhes bya ba'i snying po de dag gis mchod par bya'o //
T02D2518:66a-14: sgeg mo'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis bcings nas /
T02D2518:66a-15: rdo rje ba sgyings pa'i tshul gyis su //
T02D2518:66a-16: bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud par bya //
T02D2518:66a-17: phreng ba ma yi phyag rgya ni //
T02D2518:66a-19: glu ma'i phyag rgya ni tshig kun nas slong ba'i tshul gyis kha nas 'byin pa'o //
T02D2518:66a-20: gar mkhan ma'i phyag rgya ni /
T02D2518:66a-21: gar byas rdo rje thal sbyar spyi por gzhag / bdug spos kyi phyag rgya ni /
T02D2518:66a-22: bdug spos 'bul ba'i tshul du 'og tu ldug pa'o //
T02D2518:66a-23: me tog gi phyag rgya ni /
T02D2518:66a-24: me tog 'bul ba'i tshul gyis gyen du 'thor ba'o //
T02D2518:66a-26: mthe bong gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba'o //
T02D2518:66a-28: rang gi snying gar rab tu brkyang ster byug pa'o //
T02D2518:66a-29: bdag nyid chen po gang gang gis //
T02D2518:66a-30: phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings pas //
T02D2518:66a-31: bzlas pa'i snying po der bdag ni //
T02D2518:66a-32: bdag nyid chen po bsgom par bya //
T02D2518:66a-33: zhes bya ba 'di phyag rgya thams cad kyi dam tshig go //
T02D2518:66a-34: de'i rjes la yi ge aom las gdugs dang /
T02D2518:66a-42: kha zas ro brgya pa dang /
T02D2518:66a-43: rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i tshogs sprul
T02D2518:66a-44: te de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la yang dag
T02D2518:66a-46: 'di ltar shar phyogs nas rdo rje thal mo spyi bor brkyang la lus thams cad dang /
T02D2518:66a-47: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pu dzo bastha n'a ya /
T02D2518:66a-48: a'atma n'am ni rya ta y'a mi sarba ta th'a
T02D2518:66a-49: ga ta badzra tva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes
T02D2518:66a-51: de nas lho phyogs nas de bzhin du gnas pa las rdo rje thal mo snying gar sbyar te /
T02D2518:66b-0: dpral ba sal @66b reg par byas nas /
T02D2518:66b-1: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza aa bhi
T02D2518:66b-2: she ka ya a'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi
T02D2518:66b-3: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratna aa bhi shi
T02D2518:66b-4: nytsa m'am zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya'o //
T02D2518:66b-5: de nas nub phyogs su de bzhin du gnas pa las rdo rje thal mo spyi bor bcings /
T02D2518:66b-6: te kha sa la reg par byas te /
T02D2518:66b-7: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza pra brta
T02D2518:66b-8: n'a ya a'atma n'i ni ry'a ta y'a mi sarba
T02D2518:66b-9: tha th'a gta badzra rmma pra ta ya m'am /
T02D2518:66b-11: de nas byang phyogs su de bzhin du ngas pa las /
T02D2518:66b-12: rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste snying gar sbyar la /
T02D2518:66b-13: spyi bo sa la reg bar byas te /
T02D2518:66b-14: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza karmma ne
T02D2518:66b-15: a'a tna n'am nirya ta y'a mi sarba ta th'a
T02D2518:66b-16: ga ta badzra karmma ku ru m'am /
T02D2518:66b-18: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2518:66b-19: badzra satva ham zhes nga rgyal bskyed de /
T02D2518:66b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i zla ba'am /
T02D2518:66b-21: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la badzra satva ham zhes bya ba'am /
T02D2518:66b-22: aom badzra svatva h'um zhes bya ba mu tig gi phreng ba lta bu rnam par bkod la /
T02D2518:66b-23: ji srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa dang bsgom pa byas te /
T02D2518:66b-27: las kyi phyag rgya bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D2518:66b-28: gal te phyag rgyas skyo bar gyur tam /
T02D2518:66b-29: rang nyid stong par 'dod na yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya'o //
T02D2518:66b-30: gshegs su gsol ba'i tshe yang /
T02D2518:66b-31: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod pa dang /
T02D2518:66b-34: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos la /
T02D2518:66b-35: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis cho ga ma tshang ba
T02D2518:66b-36: gang lags pa de bzod par mdzad cig ces gsol
T02D2518:66b-37: nas / phyag rgya thams cad la dbang bskur ba
T02D2518:66b-38: dang rdo rje bya ba'i bsam pas badzra satva badzra
T02D2518:66b-39: satva zhes bya ba yang mang du bzlas te /
T02D2518:66b-40: bcom ldan 'das dam tshig gi gtso bo //
T02D2518:66b-41: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D2518:66b-42: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D2518:66b-43: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni //
T02D2518:66b-44: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2518:66b-45: zhes bskul nas badzra satva badzra satva badzra mu: zhes brjod de /
T02D2518:66b-46: 'di ltar sems ma rdo rje gyen du bkrol na gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2518:67a-0: @67a * // ji ltar sprul pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du
T02D2518:67a-1: yid kyis legs par sbyor bas rang gi lus la
T02D2518:67a-2: bcu gnas / yi ge brgya pa dang badzra satva zhes brjod de ldang bar bya'o //
T02D2518:67a-3: de ltar thun bzhi dag tyu bya'o //
T02D2518:67a-4: sgrub pa'i thabs ni byas pa yi //
T02D2518:67a-5: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa //
T02D2518:67a-6: de yis kun dga' snying po ni //
T02D2518:67a-7: gun mchog rdo rje 'chang gyur cig / slob dpon
T02D2518:67a-8: kun dga' snying po mdzad pa'i dpal rdo rje sems
T02D2518:67a-11: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su buddha shr'i sh'anti dang /
